Flow.interviewLabel: Create Job for New or Existing Account {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Create Job for New or Existing Account

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Error_Message_Duplicate
fields.fieldText:
Please read the error below highlighted in orange. Play close attention to the error after the phrase FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


To fix the errors, click the previous button to go back into the field(s) that need attention. Then, click the Next button to complete the creation of the job.


Thank you!

fields.name: Property_Name
fields.helpText: “Please enter the Name of the Building. For example, the “Chrysler Building” is an example of a Property Name.”

fields.name: Property_Number
fields.helpText: “Please enter the Store Number here. For example, Home Depot has a store number #265 for a specific location. The Suite # or Apartment # goes into the Damage Description section”

fields.name: Error_Message_Duplicate
fields.fieldText:
Please read the error below highlighted in orange. Play close attention to the error after the phrase FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


To fix the errors, click the previous button to go back into the field(s) that need attention. Then, click the Next button to complete the creation of the job.


Thank you!

textTemplates.name: CreateAccountScriptText
textTemplates.text: Please search for the account first. If found, select it and hit the next button. If not found, select the Create New Account button and hit next.
